joke.q: How Can You Identify a Bald Eagle?
joke.a: All his feathers are combed to one side

joke.q: What is the network admin favourite lullaby?
My son only knows the first 10 letters of the Alphabet
joke.a: Turns out we sent him to a pre-k school.

joke.q: The CIA has suddenly realized they've been making a horrible mistake
joke.a: They've been using black sharpie instead of yellow highlighter for years

joke.q: Taking the side length that’s opposite of an angle in a right triangle is very much frowned upon.
